name: $resourceType
desc: Returns the FHIR type name for this instance

name: $identifier
desc: Returns: A unique identifier assigned to this claim.

name: $addidentifier
desc: A unique identifier assigned to this claim.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: A unique identifier assigned to this claim.

name: $status
desc: Returns: The status of the resource instance.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The status of the resource instance.

name: $::type
desc: Returns: The category of claim, e.g. oral, pharmacy, vision, institutional, professional.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The category of claim, e.g. oral, pharmacy, vision, institutional, professional.

name: $subType
desc: Returns: A finer grained suite of claim type codes which may convey additional information such as Inpatient vs Outpatient and/or a specialty service.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A finer grained suite of claim type codes which may convey additional information such as Inpatient vs Outpatient and/or a specialty service.

name: $use
desc: Returns: A code to indicate whether the nature of the request is: to request adjudication of products and services previously rendered; or requesting authorization and adjudication for provision in the future; or requesting the non-binding adjudication of the listed products and services which could be provided in the future.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A code to indicate whether the nature of the request is: to request adjudication of products and services previously rendered; or requesting authorization and adjudication for provision in the future; or requesting the non-binding adjudication of the list

name: $patient
desc: Returns: The party to whom the professional services and/or products have been supplied or are being considered and for whom actual or forecast reimbursement is sought.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The party to whom the professional services and/or products have been supplied or are being considered and for whom actual or forecast reimbursement is sought.

name: $billablePeriod
desc: Returns: The period for which charges are being submitted.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The period for which charges are being submitted.

name: $created
desc: Returns: The date this resource was created.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The date this resource was created.

name: $enterer
desc: Returns: Individual who created the claim, predetermination or preauthorization.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Individual who created the claim, predetermination or preauthorization.

name: $insurer
desc: Returns: The Insurer who is target of the request.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The Insurer who is target of the request.

name: $provider
desc: Returns: The provider which is responsible for the claim, predetermination or preauthorization.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The provider which is responsible for the claim, predetermination or preauthorization.

name: $priority
desc: Returns: The provider-required urgency of processing the request. Typical values include: stat, routine deferred.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The provider-required urgency of processing the request. Typical values include: stat, routine deferred.

name: $fundsReserve
desc: Returns: A code to indicate whether and for whom funds are to be reserved for future claims.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A code to indicate whether and for whom funds are to be reserved for future claims.

name: $related
desc: Returns: Other claims which are related to this claim such as prior submissions or claims for related services or for the same event.

name: $addrelated
desc: Other claims which are related to this claim such as prior submissions or claims for related services or for the same event.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Other claims which are related to this claim such as prior submissions or claims for related services or for the same event.

name: $prescription
desc: Returns: Prescription to support the dispensing of pharmacy, device or vision products.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Prescription to support the dispensing of pharmacy, device or vision products.

name: $originalPrescription
desc: Returns: Original prescription which has been superseded by this prescription to support the dispensing of pharmacy services, medications or products.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Original prescription which has been superseded by this prescription to support the dispensing of pharmacy services, medications or products.

name: $payee
desc: Returns: The party to be reimbursed for cost of the products and services according to the terms of the policy.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The party to be reimbursed for cost of the products and services according to the terms of the policy.

name: $referral
desc: Returns: A reference to a referral resource.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A reference to a referral resource.

name: $facility
desc: Returns: Facility where the services were provided.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Facility where the services were provided.

name: $careTeam
desc: Returns: The members of the team who provided the products and services.

name: $addcareTeam
desc: The members of the team who provided the products and services.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: The members of the team who provided the products and services.

name: $supportingInfo
desc: Returns: Additional information codes regarding exceptions, special considerations, the condition, situation, prior or concurrent issues.

name: $addsupportingInfo
desc: Additional information codes regarding exceptions, special considerations, the condition, situation, prior or concurrent issues.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Additional information codes regarding exceptions, special considerations, the condition, situation, prior or concurrent issues.

name: $diagnosis
desc: Returns: Information about diagnoses relevant to the claim items.

name: $adddiagnosis
desc: Information about diagnoses relevant to the claim items.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Information about diagnoses relevant to the claim items.

name: $procedure
desc: Returns: Procedures performed on the patient relevant to the billing items with the claim.

name: $addprocedure
desc: Procedures performed on the patient relevant to the billing items with the claim.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Procedures performed on the patient relevant to the billing items with the claim.

name: $insurance
desc: Returns: Financial instruments for reimbursement for the health care products and services specified on the claim.

name: $addinsurance
desc: Financial instruments for reimbursement for the health care products and services specified on the claim.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Financial instruments for reimbursement for the health care products and services specified on the claim.

name: $accident
desc: Returns: Details of an accident which resulted in injuries which required the products and services listed in the claim.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Details of an accident which resulted in injuries which required the products and services listed in the claim.

name: $item
desc: Returns: A claim line. Either a simple  product or service or a 'group' of details which can each be a simple items or groups of sub-details.

name: $additem
desc: A claim line. Either a simple  product or service or a 'group' of details which can each be a simple items or groups of sub-details.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: A claim line. Either a simple  product or service or a 'group' of details which can each be a simple items or groups of sub-details.

name: $total
desc: Returns: The total value of the all the items in the claim.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The total value of the all the items in the claim.
